likelihood_impact_change.explanation: Under the Net Zero 2050 scenario, heightened environmental awareness and policies may lead to a shift in consumer preferences towards more sustainable products. This can reduce the likelihood of risk as consumers may prefer Apple's focus on sustainability, decreasing the impact on sales.

emerging_opportunities.description: As consumers become more environmentally conscious, there is an opportunity for the Mac Division to develop and market products with sustainable materials and practices.
Increased focus on remote learning and digital education can result in the Mac Division creating tailored solutions for educational institutions, enhancing market share.

additional_challenges.challenge: Supply chain disruptions due to policy changes
additional_challenges.description: Stringent policies related to carbon emissions and sustainability may affect suppliers, leading to potential delays and cost increases in the supply chain.
As the market shifts towards sustainability, new competitors may emerge with innovative eco-friendly technologies, posing a threat to market share.

mitigation_strategies.strategy: Invest in sustainable supply chain practices
mitigation_strategies.description: Apple Inc. can enhance partnerships with suppliers that focus on sustainability to mitigate risks of supply chain disruption.

mitigation_strategies.strategy: Diversify product offerings to include eco-friendly options
mitigation_strategies.description: Develop a line of Mac products that utilize recycled materials and energy-efficient technologies to attract environmentally conscious consumers.

mitigation_strategies.strategy: Enhance marketing focused on sustainability efforts
mitigation_strategies.description: Promote the Mac Division's commitment to sustainability through targeted marketing campaigns to improve brand loyalty and consumer perception.
